roadmapItems.title: Initial Launch of DataVisual
roadmapItems.description: Launch of DataVisual with core features for visualizing complex data sets.

children.title: Customizable Dashboards
children.description: Dashboards that users can customize with a variety of widgets and layouts.

children.title: Resolved issues with dashboard widget alignment.
children.description: Fixed alignment issues in the dashboard that affected widget placement.

children.title: Added new layout options for dashboards.
children.description: Introduced additional layout configurations to enhance dashboard customization.

children.title: Improved performance of dashboard loading times.
children.description: Optimized dashboard components to reduce loading times and enhance user experience.

children.title: Drag-and-Drop Interface
children.description: An intuitive drag-and-drop interface that simplifies data visualization.

children.title: Fixed bugs in the drag-and-drop functionality.
children.description: Corrected errors in the drag-and-drop mechanics that hindered user interactions.

children.title: Enhanced drag-and-drop responsiveness.
children.description: Improved the responsiveness of the drag-and-drop interface to facilitate smoother user interactions.

children.title: Introduced new drag-and-drop customization options.
children.description: Added new customization features to the drag-and-drop interface, allowing for more versatile data visualization setups.

roadmapItems.title: Real-time Data Updates and Notifications
roadmapItems.description: This release enhances real-time data updates and introduces a new notification system.

children.title: Real-time Data Updates
children.description: Updates data displays in real-time, ensuring users see the most current data.

children.title: Addressed latency issues in real-time updates.
children.description: Improved the speed of real-time updates to minimize data display delays.

children.title: Improved accuracy of real-time data.
children.description: Enhanced the precision of data displayed in real-time, ensuring higher data reliability.

children.title: Added support for more data sources in real-time updates.
children.description: Expanded the range of data sources compatible with real-time updates to increase the versatility of data feeds.

children.title: Notification System
children.description: A new system to notify users of important changes or updates within their data sets.

children.title: Fixed bugs in notification delivery.
children.description: Resolved issues that were preventing notifications from reaching users promptly.

children.title: Enhanced user interface for notification settings.
children.description: Redesigned the notification settings interface for better user experience.

children.title: Added support for push notifications.
children.description: Introduced push notifications to keep users informed about important events.

roadmapItems.title: Security and User Management
roadmapItems.description: Update focused on enhancing security features and user management capabilities.

children.title: User Authentication and Authorization
children.description: Strengthening security with better user authentication and access control.

children.title: Resolved issues with user login and access control.
children.description: Fixed bugs affecting user login procedures and access controls.

children.title: Added support for multi-factor authentication.
children.description: Implemented multi-factor authentication to improve security measures.

children.title: Improved user role management.
children.description: Enhanced the management of user roles to provide better control and flexibility.

children.title: Data Security
children.description: Improving the security protocols to safeguard user data effectively.

children.title: Fixed vulnerabilities in data encryption.
children.description: Addressed and rectified vulnerabilities found in the data encryption methods.

children.title: Upgraded security protocols for data storage.
children.description: Upgraded existing security protocols to enhance the security of stored data.

children.title: Implemented automatic security updates.
children.description: Initiated automatic updates for security measures to ensure up-to-date protection.

roadmapItems.title: Performance Enhancements and Scalability
roadmapItems.description: Release focused on optimizing performance and enhancing scalability.

children.title: Performance Optimization
children.description: Optimizing application performance to handle complex data sets more efficiently.

children.title: Fixed issues causing slow page load times.
children.description: Resolved issues that were causing delays in page loading across the application.

children.title: Improved data processing speed.
children.description: Increased the speed of data processing to facilitate faster data analysis and visualization.

children.title: Optimized database queries for better performance.
children.description: Optimized database queries to reduce load times and improve efficiency.

children.title: Scalability Enhancements
children.description: Enhancements to ensure the application scales effectively during peak usage.

children.title: Addressed issues with scaling under high traffic.
children.description: Fixed scalability issues that occurred during periods of high user traffic.

children.title: Implemented auto-scaling features.
children.description: Introduced auto-scaling capabilities to dynamically handle changes in load.

children.title: Enhanced load balancing capabilities.
children.description: Improved the load balancing techniques to ensure smooth operation during high demand.

roadmapItems.title: User Experience Improvements
roadmapItems.description: Enhancements focused on improving user experience and feedback integration.

children.title: User Interface Redesign
children.description: Redesigning the user interface for better accessibility and usability.

children.title: Fixed inconsistencies in the user interface.
children.description: Resolved various inconsistencies found in the UI.

children.title: Redesigned the UI for better accessibility.
children.description: Improved the UI design to enhance accessibility and user experience.

children.title: Added new themes and customization options.
children.description: Introduced new themes and customization options for better personalization.

children.title: User Feedback Integration
children.description: Integrating user feedback into the product to better meet user needs.

children.title: Resolved issues reported by users.
children.description: Addressed and fixed issues reported through user feedback.

children.title: Implemented user-requested features.
children.description: Added new features based on user requests to improve functionality.

children.title: Improved feedback collection process.
children.description: Enhanced the process for collecting and analyzing user feedback.

roadmapItems.title: Data Visualization Enhancements
roadmapItems.description: Enhancements focused on improving data visualization capabilities.

children.title: New Chart Types
children.description: Introducing new chart types for more versatile data visualization.

children.title: Fixed rendering issues with new charts.
children.description: Resolved rendering issues encountered with the newly introduced charts.

children.title: Added support for heatmaps and tree maps.
children.description: Introduced support for heatmaps and tree maps to expand visualization options.

children.title: Improved interactivity of existing charts.
children.description: Enhanced the interactivity features of existing charts to improve user engagement.

children.title: Advanced Filtering Options
children.description: Adding advanced filtering options to refine data visualization.

children.title: Fixed bugs in filter functionality.
children.description: Resolved bugs affecting the functionality of data filters.

children.title: Added multi-level filtering options.
children.description: Introduced multi-level filtering options to allow for more detailed data analysis.

children.title: Enhanced filter performance for large datasets.
children.description: Improved the performance of data filters to handle large datasets more efficiently.

roadmapItems.title: Integration and API Improvements
roadmapItems.description: Enhancements focused on improving integration capabilities and API performance.

children.title: Third-party Integrations
children.description: Enhancing integrations with third-party services for better data compatibility.

children.title: Fixed issues with integrating external APIs.
children.description: Resolved issues that were causing problems with external API integrations.

children.title: Added support for new data sources.
children.description: Included support for additional data sources to increase versatility.

children.title: Improved integration documentation.
children.description: Enhanced the documentation for third-party integrations to assist developers.

children.title: API Enhancements
children.description: Improving the API for better performance and usability.

children.title: Addressed issues with API rate limits.
children.description: Fixed issues related to API rate limits that were affecting performance.

children.title: Added new API endpoints for data manipulation.
children.description: Introduced new API endpoints to provide more options for data manipulation.

children.title: Improved API response times.
children.description: Enhanced the API to reduce response times and improve performance.

roadmapItems.title: Collaboration Tools
roadmapItems.description: Introducing new tools to enhance collaboration and data sharing capabilities.

children.title: Real-time Collaboration
children.description: Enabling real-time collaboration on data visualizations.

children.title: Fixed synchronization issues in collaborative editing.
children.description: Resolved issues causing synchronization problems during collaborative editing.

children.title: Improved real-time editing performance.
children.description: Enhanced the performance of real-time editing to provide a smoother experience.

children.title: Added version control for collaborative projects.
children.description: Introduced version control features to track changes in collaborative projects.

children.title: Sharing and Exporting
children.description: Enhancing the tools for sharing and exporting data visualizations.

children.title: Resolved issues with exporting data visualizations.
children.description: Fixed problems encountered when exporting data visualizations.

children.title: Added more export formats and options.
children.description: Introduced additional formats and options for exporting data visualizations.

children.title: Improved sharing settings and permissions.
children.description: Enhanced the settings and permissions for sharing data visualizations.
